 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package ch.ethz.rtc.kernel

Class Summary
AperiodicPart AperiodicPart represents the aperiodic part of a curve.
Curve Curve represents a piecewise linear curve.
CurveChecker CurveChecker provides methods to check properties of a Curve.
CurveFactory CurveFactory provides methods to create instances of Curve.
CurveMath CurveMath provides methods to do mathematics with curves.
CurveSegmentIterator CurveSegmentIterator provides an iterator that iterates over the single curve segments of a curve.
CurveSubSegmentIterator CurveSubSegmentIterator provides an iterator that iterates over the single curve sub-segments of two curves.
CurveSubSegmentIteratorInv CurveSubSegmentIteratorInv provides an iterator that iterates over the single vertical curve sub-segments of the of two curves.
LimitedSegment CurveSegment represents a limited curve segment.
MatlabUtil MatlabUtil provides utilities for the use of Matlab as frontend.
Parameters Parameters provides globel parameters.
PeriodicPart AperiodicPartr represents the periodic part of a curve.
Segment Segment represents a single curve segment.
SegmentList SegmentList represents an ordered list of curve segments.
SegmentListIterator SegmentListIterator provides an iterator that iterates over the single curve segments of a segment list.
SegmentMath SegmentMath provides methods to do mathematics with segments.
 

Exception Summary
IllegalOperationException IllegalOperationException provides an exception that is thrown when an illegal operation is executed.
